TILE.name: Today Sales
TILE.where: (DATE(approved_date)=CURRENT_DATE AND is_valid is true AND approved is true)

TILE.name: Monthly Sales
TILE.where: (extract(month from approved_date) = extract(month from CURRENT_DATE) AND extract(year from approved_date) = extract(year from CURRENT_DATE) AND is_valid is true AND approved is true)

TILE.name: Yearly Sales
TILE.where: (extract(year from approved_date) = extract(year from CURRENT_DATE) AND is_valid is true AND approved is true)

TILE.name: Total Sales
TILE.where: (is_valid is true AND approved is true)

TILE.where: (approved is true AND is_valid is true)
